      • InfiniteServer

        public InfiniteServer(JEQNName name,
              JEQNTimeFactory timeFactory,
              it.uniroma2.sel.simlab.simarch.factories.Layer3ToLayer2Factory factory,
              ServiceRequestGenerator generator,
              it.uniroma2.sel.simlab.simarch.data.Time sendingAheadDelay)
               throws it.uniroma2.sel.simlab.simarch.exceptions.InvalidNameException
        Creates a new InfiniteServer in the EQN network
        Parameters:
        name - Element name. The name is used to identify entities within the simulation model.
        timeFactory - Instances the jEQN time object that contains the value for the simulation time.
        factory - According to the Factory pattern, factory is used to instantiates the implementation of Layer3ToLayer2 interface, which provides level 3 services to level 2.
        generator - GEneratoro of service requests
        sendingAheadDelay -
        Throws:
        it.uniroma2.sel.simlab.simarch.exceptions.InvalidNameException - An InvalidNameException is raised when an issue concerning the element name occurs.
